item.title: Hugo Advanced
item.author: i70170@hotmail.com (Mike Chang)
item.description:
# Emoji

  • use emojify function and Inline Shortcodes to type emoji directly in content files
    • configuration requirements: set enableEmoji to true
    • will enable Unicode Standard emoji characters and sequences
    • the rendering depends on the browser/platform
    • e.g. 
      I :heart: you
      I ❤️ you
  • Emoji cheat sheet
  • use a 3rd party emoji font or a font stack 
    .emoji {
  font-family: Android Emoji, EmojiSymbols;
}

# Plugin: Giscus

  1. Select a repo as the database of the comments system
  2. Install giscus on the selected repo
  3. Enable GitHub Discussions
  4. Configure Giscus parameters

Add the configure parameters to .toml

GiscusRepo = "Vitaceae/vitaceae.github.io"
GiscusRepoId = "R_kgDOOLku4g"
GiscusDiscussionCategory = "General"
GiscusCategoryId = "DIC_kwDOOLku4s4CoQfG"
...

Take the theme anubis2 for example, the parameters will be used in layouts/partials/giscus.html and embedded to each .html files

# Plugin: Umami Cloud

  • Umami Cloud

# RSS Feed 

rssAsSocialIcon = true

# Hide Post

add hidden = true to the front matter of the post; available only by link

# Rich Content

  • Privacy Config
  • Simple Shortcodes: provides media embeds with static and no-JS versions

## YouTube Privacy Enhanced

to embed https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s-0ganwG284, use {{< youtube s-0ganwG284 >}}

## X

{{< x user="DesignReviewed" id="1895566669281636846" >}}

pic.twitter.com/Ja8HQTFpf7

— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 28, 2025

## Vimeo

{{< vimeo_simple 572521128 >}}

# SVG Placeholder

note: don’t know how to convert .svg from here to inline code

# Math Notation

  • add math = true to the front matter of the post
  • use the 3rd party JavaScript libraries(MathJax)

## Inline 

golden ratio $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887… $$

golden ratio $$ \varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887… $$

## Block 

$$
 1+\frac{a} {1+\frac{b} {1+\frac{c} {1+\cdots} } }
$$

$$ 1+\frac{a} {1+\frac{b} {1+\frac{c} {1+\cdots} } } $$

# Multiline Codes

  • linenos=table|inline: generate a copy-and-paste button
  • hl_lines=[$range1,$range2,$range3,...]: highlight lines
  • linenostart=$val: index of the first line
  • anchorlinenos=true: create links to lines
199int main() {
200    int a = 1;
201
202    if (a == 999)
203        // todo~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
204    }
205    return 0;
206}

# Problems

Error: … parse failed: template: partials/giscus.html:1: unexpected unclosed action in command

need Hugo v0.81.0+
